DOC.brief_summary: Hypotension after spinal anesthesia for cesarean delivery occurs frequently. Oscillometric measurement gives intermittent informations. Nexfin, a continuous noninvasive device, could help to detect hypotension.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of NEXFIN During Cesarean Delivery to Detect Hypotension
DOC.criteria: adult patients undergoing elective cesarean delivery performed under spinal anesthesia patients with a heart rhythm disorder, Raynaud's disease or a history of vascular surgery of the upper limb
